University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Robert E. Lee Memorial Foundation, 1968-1973, Accession #10434-b, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the Library by Mrs. Linton R. Massey of Keswick, Virginia, on June 5, 1987.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The foundation maintains and operates Robert E. Lee's birthplace, Stratford Hall.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These twenty-three items, 1968-1973, are chiefly the agendas and "Charts of Committee Meetings" of the directors of the Robert E. Lee Memorial Foundation, Inc., in its operation of "Stratford Hall," Westmoreland County, Virginia.
